@echo off
rem build script for 'c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc'
rem [button: Release]
cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe
jc -amac -brelease qpad.jc
